channel.title: Naruto
channel.description:
Alright i was messing around to see if i could get any cool effects going or anything thats why the background is black and really empty... just rate the middle of the sig :)... I think it turned out pretty cool but i wish i had made a bg before i made it =\ o well
[img]http://www.freewebs.com/sk8kid27/naruto%20copy.png[/img]

item.title: Naruto
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:6, topic:142456”][quote author=fellixombc link=topic=194900.msg1750671#msg1750671 date=1189577193]
text sucks, but the fx is good,
8/10
[/quote]Congratulations, you’ve just increased a faggot award! Your now full blown gay!
But seriously, you tell people the exact same thing every time with a different number. The worse they get the bigger the number gets. I do say its a bit odd.

Billy, I would have to rate it 1/10 for sheer lack of art. Theres nothing going on, nothing to look at. Just a small light in the middle of a big black scene.[/quote]

i know why you rated it like that so yea. I was messing around and i came to this i liked it but i know there was alot of big black empty space.

[quote=“fellixombc, post:7, topic:142456”][quote author=exe626 link=topic=194900.msg1750908#msg1750908 date=1189582493]

text sucks, but the fx is good,
8/10
[/quote]Congratulations, you’ve just increased a faggot award! Your now full blown gay!
But seriously, you tell people the exact same thing every time with a different number. The worse they get the bigger the number gets. I do say its a bit odd.

Billy, I would have to rate it 1/10 for sheer lack of art. Theres nothing going on, nothing to look at. Just a small light in the middle of a big black scene.

congrats? no your a bitch. so stfu now pls you fail.[/quote]

i can see why your mad at him for flaming you about your opinion but you could do it over pms or something =\ less spam but then again if you flame on threads you get post count

Read full topic
